divs: Sighting DetailsI live not far from an airport so thought at first might be an airplane. But airplanes are not round and don't fly that low and make noise. I was sitting on the edge of my bed and glanced out the window and saw this round disc go over very quietly the tops of the trees it was maybe 9 to 11 at night. I looked and looked to determine shape. It was round with lights around the edges and a small red flashing light beneath. It was moving slowly and quietly. It just kept moving I think the direction of Illinois. As for feeling I am not scared of any visitors and as this is first time I ever saw something like this was a little surprised after hearing of others seeing this same sort of thing. I have mixed feelings thinking that it could have been made here in this country.
Summary: Iwas setting on edge of my bed. And glanced over to bedroom window { curtains were open. And saw this round disc go slowly over the tops of trees it had lights sround the edges and it looked also like a small flashing red light on the bottom. I live not
